creator: Medal B.V.
descriptionHtml:
Medal helps you share and watch epic gaming moments.


SHARE FROM PC

• Each highlight gets a unique shareable link
• Share clips directly to iMessage, Twitter, WhatsApp, Messenger, etc.
• Share clips in group chat
• Manage your chats with tools like mods, kicking, banning, and more

WATCH

• Watch stories of epic clips
• Watch only the games that you care about
• Follow your friends
• Upvote and comment
• Favorite clips and save them to your profile

RECORD

Download Medal Desktop (medal.tv/desktop) onto your computer and your recordings will show up instantly on the app!

• Press a hotkey to record what you just did on-screen
• Highlights automatically show up on your phone
• Easy on the GPU
• Free storage
• Fully synced to the Medal app



Have fun and remember: clips or it didn’t happen.


For feedback and questions, please contact us via our social media:

Discord
https://www.medal.tv/discord

Twitter
https://twitter.com/medal_tv

Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/medal.tv

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/medalapp


Terms of Service
https://medal.tv/tos
descriptionShort: Share & Watch Epic PC Gaming Moments From Your Phone With Your Friends

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* Complete makeover
* Optimized for better performance
* Faster load time
* Syncing unpublished clips
* New Topics Page
* Bug fixes

descriptionShort: Share & Watch Epic PC Gaming Moments From Your Phone With Your Friends

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
* New design
* Removal of Firebase
* Update of drawers + bottom tabs
* Syncing unpublished clips
* New Topics Page
* Updated Sharescreen
* Users can now share to multiple users/groups at a time
* Added new tabs to settings page
* Implemented ability to manage social connections
* Bug fixes
